Description

Space Runaway is shoot'em up where you are completely unarmed and will have to use all his intelligence and skill to Overcome several challenges in this game hardcore que will hold you for hours.


Controls
  • Arows: Move;
  • Enter: Pause.


Game Elements
  • 14 enemies ;
  • 12 additional challenges ;
  • Shield upgrades and speed ;
  • Auto Save.
